title: autentcation  bug(pc)
body:
was able to play a  quick game early this morning  around 7am this morning  was able to login   ad such just fine

got home around  6pm for last hour   I'm stuck on authentication  not letting me   log in  this has happen quite a lot  since last week  riot fix this please

replies.body: Typically those authentication errors are caused by some kind of weird blockage between your network and our login servers. We should be able to get that smoothed out relatively easily by taking a second look at some of your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). Hit me back up if that doesn't help and we can dig a little deeper!
